Class Spectral

Kernel ANSI C Spectral operations, FFT performed on a whole image, last updated 11/22/99 These functions are part of the Image Processing Library IPL98. More...

Functions

bool k_FFT (int isign, TComplexImage *pImg)
 performs a Fast Fourier Transformation (FFT) (if isign =1) or an inverse FFT (if isign=-1).

Detailed Description

Kernel ANSI C Spectral operations, FFT performed on a whole image, last updated 11/22/99 These functions are part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

Version:
0.80
Author:
Ivar Balslev ivb@mip.sdu.dk

Function Documentation

bool k_FFT (  int    isign,
TComplexImage *    pImg
) 
 

performs a Fast Fourier Transformation (FFT) (if isign =1) or an inverse FFT (if isign=-1).

Parameters:
isign  FFT if 1 and inverse FFT if -1
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image
Returns :
False if the width or the height is not a power of 2 or if *pImg is empty
